description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hey Kids! Your backyard has been taken over.  What can you do about it?  Are you brave enough to suit up and battle it out with the pests that have control of your space, or are you doomed to stay inside your house forever?
description.short: Hey Kids! Your backyard has been taken over.  What can you do about it?  Are you brave enough to suit up and battle it out with the pests that have control of your space, or are you doomed to stay inside your house forever?
